name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Gods & Kings
name_original: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Gods & Kings
description:
Sid Meier's Civilization V: Gods & Kings is a strategy game developed by Firaxis. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by 2K Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Sid Meier's Civilization V: Gods & Kings is available on PC.
